about_the_game:
THE NIGHT IS GREY - ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK

Enjoy the musical storytelling of The Night is Grey with the FullOriginal Soundtrack. Besides including all 10 tracks heard throughout the storyline, it also has a special track that arranges them all to create a cohesive audio experience. With this, you'll have the soundscape of the game without having to complete puzzles ever again!

content_descriptors.notes: Although there are no graphic depictions of violence in the game, the storyline implies the existence of violence as well as a history of abuse and psychological trauma. The plot in itself might be triggering for some players.
